text:
@morningmika @realDonaldTrump Just the fact-you have absolutely no evidence that Cain contracted Covid-19 as a result of attending the Tulsa rally & not wearing a mask but feel the complusive need to exploit a great man's death to make a snarky, political statement.

Mika & Joe....two scumbags in a pod!
